examples.title: Top stories on Hacker News
examples.body: Fetch the top three news (as ranked by points) on Hacker News front page (https://news.ycombinator.com/front). Read their content. Provide a summary of each news in a markdown file document.

examples.title: Send an email
examples.body: Send an email to laurent@eschenauer.be, tell him how awesome OpenGPA is.

examples.title: Generate a Podcast of the Top News
examples.body: Look at the top news on https://www.bbc.com/news/world, pick the top three stories, generate a news brief in the style of a daily updates on PBS news. Use the tone of voice of a radio journalist presenting the show. Your listeners are worldwide audience eager to learn the latest news.

examples.title: Collect data on top cryptocurrencies
examples.body: Lookup the top 5 crypto currencies by marketcap, generate a CSV file with their name, token symbol, market cap and today's price.
